docs.snippet: Seattle’s Wilson was overshadowed by Peyton Manning and other players before the Super Bowl, but at game time he took center stage....
docs.lead_paragraph: Seattle’s Wilson was overshadowed by Peyton Manning and other players before the Super Bowl, but at game time he took center stage.
docs.abstract: Seattle Seahawks quarterback Russell Wilson, overshadowed by Peyton Manning in lead up to the Super Bowl, takes center stage with cool, perfectly-orchestrated performance.

headline.main: Russell Wilson, the Forgotten Quarterback, Coolly Orchestrates ‘a Perfect Football Game’
headline.print_headline: Wilson, the Forgotten Quarterback, Coolly Orchestrates ‘a Perfect Football Game’

docs.snippet: An International Olympic Committee rule that forces a sport to wait seven years before it can potentially become part of the Games program is "more or less obsolete," IOC President Thomas Bach said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: An International Olympic Committee rule that forces a sport to wait seven years before it can potentially become part of the Games program is "more or less obsolete," IOC President Thomas Bach said on Monday.

headline.main: IOC Chief Says Seven-Year Rule Not Set in Stone
headline.print_headline: IOC Chief Says Seven-Year Rule Not Set in Stone

docs.snippet: Russell Wilson has been defying conventional wisdom about quarterbacks for years. On Sunday, he did it again, on the National Football League's biggest stage, helping the Seattle Seahawks beat the Denver Broncos 43-8 to win the Super Bowl....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russell Wilson has been defying conventional wisdom about quarterbacks for years. On Sunday, he did it again, on the National Football League's biggest stage, helping the Seattle Seahawks beat the Denver Broncos 43-8 to win the Super Bowl.

headline.main: Wilson Shows Maturity Beyond His Years to Win Super Bowl
headline.print_headline: Wilson Shows Maturity Beyond His Years to Win Super Bowl
